comments:
When I create a bottom up web service in the WTP 2.0 build from 20070412 I get a class cast exception on line332 of WebArtifactEdit.  This only seems to happen when I target tomcat 6.

These are the steps I took:
1. Installed tomcat 6 runtime
2. Created Dynamic web project targeting tomcat 6,
3. Created a simple java bean
4. Ran bottom up web service wizard on java bean.  Ran into the following error:

IWAB0020E Error in adding servlet in web.xml.

Mark, was the facet version for the Dynamic Web Project 2.5?  (I would assume so, since it was an org.eclipse.jst.javaee model that was loaded.)  This is work that is still underway.  (However, this defect does need to be addressed.)

Yes, my project has "Dynamic Web Module" version 2.5 and Java Version 5.0 as facets.  I didn't change any facets manually, those were the defaults selected when creating a web project targeting tomcat 6.
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.axis.creation.ui.command.UpdateWEBXMLCommand.addServlet() needs to be changed to handle EE5 case, the API's are still in development, see bugzilla 175139
